name: Aspected Helios
name_ja: アスペクト・ヘリオス
help: Restores Own HP And The HP Of All Nearby Party Members. Cure Potency: 200  Nocturnal Sect Cure Potency: 150 Diurnal Sect Effect: Regen  Cure Potency: 40  Duration: 30s  Effect Cannot Be Stacked. Nocturnal Sect Effect: Erects A Magicked Barrier Which Nullifies Damage Equaling The Amount Of HP Restored  Duration: 30s  Effect Cannot Be Stacked With Adloquium.
json: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.

yes.yes: Cure Potency: 200  Nocturnal Sect Cure Potency: 150

json: Diurnal Sect Effect: Regen  Cure Potency: 40  Duration: 30s  Effect cannot be stacked.

yes.yes: Nocturnal Sect Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling the amount of HP restored  Duration: 30s  Effect cannot be stacked with Adloquium.
